pages.text:
Support
Theatre Winter Haven is a vital part of our community, enriching lives through the power of live theatre. We believe in the transformative impact of the arts and strive to provide accessible and engaging experiences for all.
The thrill of live theatre depends on more than just the applause. Ticket sales, while vital, only cover a portion of our operating costs. To keep the stage alive and vibrant, we rely on the generosity of our community. Your support, whether a single donation or ongoing commitment, ensures we can continue to produce captivating productions, nurture young talent, and bring the magic of live theatre to our doorstep. Every contribution, big or small, is a vote of confidence in the power of the arts. Your support is tax-deductible.
DONATE NOW
Giving Programs
Make A One Time Donation
You may make a one-time contribution or break up a large gift into a smaller recurring gift. On the online donation form, choose the amount of each installment and the frequency of your gift, or contact Briann Hemp at briann@theatrewinterhaven.com.
Sponsorships
For more information on sponsorship opportunities please
visit our Sponsors Page
.
Planned Giving
Please consider Theatre Winter Haven in your estate planning to leave a lasting legacy and impact the arts for generations to come. For more information and option, contact Briann Hemp at briann@theatrewinterhaven.com
Matching Gifts
Does your employer match employee gifts? Many employers will match the gift you make to Theatre Winter Haven. Some will even continue matching after you retire!
Tax Deductibility
Theatre Winter Haven is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. No benefits are provided in exchange for donations, which are tax-deductible as allowed by federal tax law.
Mail a Gift
Gifts can be mailed to:
Theatre Winter Haven
P.O. Drawer 1230
Winter Haven, FL 33882
All checks should be made payable to Theatre Winter Haven.

Contact
Theatre Winter Haven
For general inquiries, ticketing information, or to learn more about our upcoming productions and volunteer opportunities, please contact us through the following methods.
You can also visit our box office during business hours.
Phone: 863-294-7469
Mailing Address: PO Drawer 1230 Winter Haven, FL 33882
Email: Tickets@TheatreWinterHaven.com
Box Office Hours:
Tuesday-Friday, 1:00pm-4:00pm and 90 minutes prior to scheduled curtain times.

The thrill of live theatre depends on more than just the applause. Ticket sales, while vital, only cover a portion of our operating costs. To keep the stage alive and vibrant, we rely on the generosity of our community. Your support, whether a single donation or ongoing commitment, ensures we can continue to produce captivating productions, nurture young talent, and bring the magic of live theatre to our doorstep. Every contribution, big or small, is a vote of confidence in the power of the arts. Your support is tax-deductible.

About Us
Theatre Winter Haven has been called “one of the best community theatres in America” by the Tampa Tribune, the Lakeland Ledger and the Winter Haven News Chief. Since our founding, Theatre Winter Haven has worked to fulfill our Mission Statement:
“We inspire, challenge, entertain, and educate our community by creating exceptional theatrical experiences”
Theatre Winter Haven was established in 1970 as the cultural arts arm of the City of Winter Haven. In 1981, Theatre Winter Haven became a separate, nonprofit entity registered as a 501(c)(3). Each year, Theatre Winter Haven produces a five-play MainStage subscription season, a three-play youth series, a Professional Series, and numerous Tribute Tuesday Series events.
Opened Fall of 2022, the Norman and Linda Small SecondStage, Theatre Winter Haven’s new Blackbox theatre now produces a three-play SecondStage subscription season.
